definition: Huaxi Village in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1 su1 Sheng3]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村開始開發船運，鋼鐵，菸草和紡織業。

sentences.english: The village is no stranger to curious projects either.
sentences.chinese: 在華西村，各種奇奇怪怪的工程也不少見。

sentences.english: The party secretary says he wants to turn the "city village" of Huaxi into a Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 他表示自己想把華西村建設成香格里拉。

sentences.english: It worked so well that Huaxi has become the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 現在華西村已經變成中國最富裕的村莊了。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community, typical of eastern China.
sentences.chinese: 從前，華西村不過是個典型的華東貧困村莊。

sentences.english: New houses stand in Huaxi village, China's richest village in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 中國最富裕的村莊華西村，新民居鱗次櫛比。

sentences.english: Until recently, Huaxi was a poor farming community in Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前，華西村還只是江蘇省一個貧困的農業村。

sentences.english: Huaxi Village, located east of the city of Jiangyin, in Jiangsu province, claims to be the richest village in China.
sentences.chinese: 華西村位於江蘇省江陰市東部，是中國最富裕的村莊。
